import sys

def main():
    # Read input
    P, Q, R = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())

    # Solve
    min_sum = min(P + Q, Q + R, R + P)

    # Print result
    print(min_sum)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

import sys

def main():
    # read the input
    P, Q, R = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())

    # compute the answer
    answer = min(P+Q, Q+R, R+P)

    # print the answer
    print(answer)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
